entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
